metadata.title: CVE-2023-5612 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions before16.6.6, 16.7 prior to 16.7.4, and 16.8 prior to 16.8.1. It was possible toread the user email address via tags feed although the visibility in theuser profile has been disabled.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
